subject: Improve merge strategy
description:
Right now the merge conflicts are resolved by using the remote data, only text data could be in conflict anytime.
This will be improved in two steps
1- Merge and commit the content of the text and resolve it manually.
2- Present a UI to merge the data and then commit

Since only text of the issues, comments and descriptions could be in conflict, this UI could be a list of the conflict text to be resolved one by one
author: Victor Jimenez
